title: Font used by Robert Indiana for his famous "LOVE" picture
content:
I am designing a booklet cover for a type project.  
My idea is to design the word type in the style of Robert Indiana's famous love picture.  
The nearest I've got so far is , Century Schoolbook Bold and Century Bold Expanded.  
If anyone knows the actual typeface used I'd really appreciate a reply.  
Thanks,  
Wyatt
author: wyatt
